parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Headlight Failure due to Lighting Control Module (LCM) Malfunction
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the headlight system can cause accidents, especially at night, and leave drivers stranded. It can also lead to citations and fines.
symptoms: Headlights shut off while driving
intermittent headlight failure
headlight failure without warning
inability to turn on headlights
dim or inoperable headlights
visible smoke coming from under the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Light Control Module (LCM) can cause the headlights to malfunction or fail, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents, especially at night.
symptoms: Headlights turn off or malfunction while driving
intermittent headlight failure
parking lights and dash lights remain on
headlight failure when switching to automatic mode
and delayed or no response when switching to headlight mode.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the electrical system can cause the headlights, taillights, and other exterior lights to malfunction or fail, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Electrical system indicator illuminates
headlights
taillights
and other exterior lights malfunction or fail
and faulty wiring or short circuits.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch and transmission system can cause the vehicle to lose power or stall, leading to reduced control and increased risk of accidents.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
and difficulty shifting gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column shaft can cause the steering wheel to seize or become difficult to turn, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the steering wheel seizes or locks up
the steering wheel binds or clicks when turning
the steering column shaft is corroded or rusted
the vehicle is difficult to maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Corrosion of Steering Linkages and Universal Joints
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The corrosion of steering linkages and universal joints can cause the steering wheel to seize or become difficult to turn, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the steering wheel seizes or locks up
the steering wheel binds or clicks when turning
the steering linkages and universal joints are corroded or rusted
the vehicle is difficult to maneuver.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the heat shield can cause it to separate from the exhaust manifold and interfere with the steering linkages, leading to loss of control and increasing the risk of a crash.
symptoms: The heat shield is corroded or rusted
the heat shield separates from the exhaust manifold
the steering wheel feels stiff or hard to turn
the steering wheel seizes or locks up
the vehicle is difficult to maneuver.
